introduction: A full-stack TypeScript developer with a strong focus on cloud engineering and hands-on experience with NodeJS and AWS.

items.description: In addition to contributing to the continuous enhancement of Cheqroom's services, I took the lead in managing the cloud environment with a focus on architecture, security, cost optimization, and deployment strategies, ensuring high performance and scalability.

Developed a new backend solution leveraging Event Sourcing and Domain-Driven Design within a microservice architecture using NestJS and GraphQL federation. Transitioned the cloud infrastructure to Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and aligned it with AWS' Well-Architected Framework, improving reliability and efficiency.

Maintained and enhanced the CMS platform supporting the MT.Vision, a Digital Signage solution.
Contributed to the development of the communication layer for the MT.Matic, a digital wall dispenser for pharmaceuticals.
Was hired after my internship to contribute to both backend and frontend projects, transitioning from Laravel to CraftCMS.
Built various customer websites using Laravel (PHP) during my internship at DAS Media.
